0: The staff are very helpful and try hard to answer all requests
The staff was incredible and we really appreciated the cake with a sparkler
We ate at both restaurants and had outstanding service and wonderful meals
Manor at the front desk yesterday and Faudi at the desk today did everything they could without cloying to make our visit pleasant
The comfort of the rooms great service fantastic food wonderful location
Excellent service and nice extras including the wonderful food included in half board and the complementary live performance of songs from the 60s
Most of the crew have a calm and welcoming spirit
the staff is so friendly helpful the food is DELICIOUS
1: Staff not really helpful and kind
The staff were expecting us by name after passing through the security barrier

And despite signs in the bathroom indicating that in an effort to be environmentally responsible used towels would only be replaced when left on the floor the housekeeping staff replaced them every day even when we hung them up
Some people are very noisy including some staff members do not respect need for quiet space of others
If you r looking for a quiet place good food nice rooms but not modern and great service this will be the place for u
I do not find it fair to have such nice employees suffer over the shortcomings of the property
Pool jacuzi were over ChemSauna was not hot enough The open spaces have mosquitos Staff were bland
And it is not the room service or the restaurant stuff service but the attitude of people you talk to in the front desk
the staff is a mix of older clerks at the desk who do not smile or make you feel welcome and younger waitresses that are a bit indifferent
After few years we came back to the Hotel and I am glade to see that the Service Rooms Food are the same high level
